website_summaries.verdict: High-end equipment is professional grade, but beginner friendly.
pros: High-powered and engineered to generate desirable results on several skin types
Reviews suggest you can attain a professional-looking tan at home that fades naturally
cons: While it can set in an hour, it won't set in the suggested 10 minutes

customer_reviews.title: Solution spits and splatters
customer_reviews.text: I own a mobile tan business and have had my maxi mist for almost 9 years. It worked wonders. When it finally came time to upgrade I wanted to stick with this brand and heard great reviews on this machine specifically. Pros- very lightweight, easy to transport, sleek design and comes with 4 guns Cons- seems very cheap quality compared to my last maxi mist machine, very thin cheap plastic including guns. Unfortunately it has a huge problem with “splattering” or spitting the solution, it comes out blotchy and very wet. For me this is a huge problem and I have clients complaining about streaking and blotchiness. Will be returning and upgrading to the nice metal guns.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Grissen

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm very happy with the MaxiMist Allure Xena. The machine was very easy to assemble and is light weight making it a good option for mobile tanners. The product flows from the gun nice and even (make sure the trigger is adjusted for a light to medium flow). Overall I am happy with how well the machine works, it's not too loud, product distribution is even, and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kinder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect equipment for mobile spray tanning-not too loud and very ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect equipment for mobile spray tanning-not too loud and very light weight. I have used several different spray tan guns and this is definitely one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I own a Mobile Spray Tan business and had seen good reviews for the MaxiMist system. For me this system has been a complete waste of money the gun clogs after each use, it doesn't spray evenly the solution either barely comes out or it comes out to fast . The solution is also not up to par it gives great instant color but completely disappears after first shower.
customer_reviews.author: lachellelawson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn how it works and set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to learn how it works and set up. It does take some time for practice. And overspraying in places and too much in other places will occur the first few times using it. Product takes an hour to dry, not the 10 minutes indicated in the instructions. Good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Tim the toolman

customer_reviews.title: Love the MaxiMist Allure Xena!
customer_reviews.text: Love this MaxiMist Allure sunless System! Even though inexperienced, the first spray tan looked beautiful. It was easy enough that my husband was able to spray me without blotches. Great alternative to UV bulbs. I received comments that I looked like I had been to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Keeble

customer_reviews.title: I love that it comes with 3 handle/guns
customer_reviews.text: This model is so much quieter. I can talk while spraying clients. I love that it comes with 3 handle/guns.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme C.

customer_reviews.title: PEOPLE Get THIS MACHINE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a different brands of spray tanning machines and i didn't like them cuz they wasn't working good, solution wasn't coming out from nozzle. but I purchased this machine and I REALLY LIKE IT!!!!!! It's working very good, and easy. I'm happy with this)))
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I was sent a used machine. Upon unboxing, I found it wasn’t completely sealed in plastic, almost as if someone had already put it together, and the listing says it comes with extra cups but I only got one. I still wanted to give it whirl and the tan came out really blotchy. The nozzle sputtered just like the other reviewers state. Sending back! Looks like I’ll be sticking with the Iwata.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Now I've had a chance to use this machine a few times. I like it a lot. It's quiet, the solution comes out in such a fine mist that it dries super fast allowing me to put multiple coats on. Very easy to use. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheermom99

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sprays evenly with no splatter, just a beautiful mist. Very happy, thanks guys xx
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use even the first time. Looks great would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, easy to use and clients love the even tan!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Overton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its very easy to use it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hanan

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: Very easily transportable! Such an easy set up! You do need to read all instructions before starting to ensure that you are setting it up right because if not then it will come out spotty on them. This machine can handle client after client after client. If does not overheat easily. It does spray really hard so make sure you aren't to close. Great air pressure for drying them afterwards. Also super cute color! I really enjoy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bookout

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to start a mobile tanning business and I have to say it’s AWSOME!!!!! LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: vickie

customer_reviews.title: I’ve called the Technical support they were very nice and helpful
customer_reviews.text: First I was not sure if I wanted to keep it, because I thought it was over spraying, I’ve called the Technical support they were very nice and helpful, it works great and I really like the solution that came with it I will continue buying the same solution.
customer_reviews.author: Gulden

customer_reviews.title: Returned because of plastic, flimsy nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Retuned. I love my maxi mist but was hoping to upgrade to a more durable machine and nozzle. This came with an even cheaper looking nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: bronson hatch

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this machine. Solutions may be not good bc there samples and have been sitting for too long. Other than that love it , I would recommend this if your planning on doing a business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love it, you can still talk to your customer and the tube is long plenty of it. Great brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this gun and all its accessories
customer_reviews.text: Love this gun and all its accessories!! Highly recommended! The spray is so fine and the mist covers a lot of area!! Well worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy to use much better than my other machine and loved it comes with three spray guns!
customer_reviews.author: TOS93

customer_reviews.title: Clean your Maximist!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this machine and I couldn't be happier with the outcome. He is now spraying not only me but several others in our Nudist community. The maximist is easy to operate, adjust,spray and clean. We use two types of Norvell product in it, Aussie Bronze and Venetian One. Both perform fantastic and as long as it is cleaned after use we expect many sessions from this powerful well built unit.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Purtlebaugh

product_meta.title: MaxiMist Allure Xena Sunless Spray Tanning System (HVLP)
feature_bullets: Salon/Mobile Self Tanner Spray Tanning System unit rated for 25 plus applications a day. Very Beginner Friendly Base has on board gun storage Lightweight Mobile design Retractable hidden carry handle On board cord management feature on base

1 Xena Spray Tanning Gun with horizontal and vertical pattern and flow adjustments Teflon needle for virtually clog free performance Patented Spray Nozzle provides outstanding atomization for perfect coverage as well as reducing over spray
Detailed Instruction Manual CE, EU, ECAL Certifications Spare parts kit included free Complete New System ready to spray out of the box

Includes Tampa Bay Tan Sunless Spray Tanning Products that are 100% Vegan, Not Tested On Animals Paraben and Gluten Free Contain Natural and Organic Ingredients Professional Level Solution in 3 depths Manufactured and Formulated by Tampa Bay Tan Everything you need to get started.
2 year warranty on Turbine Motor Unique hidden filter placement
